imdb.title: Derutora kuesuto
imdb.plot: Leif must restore the seven gems and the belt of Deltora to save his homeland. Along with his companions Barda and Jasmine, Lief must face devious enemies and dangerous beasts to oust the Shadow Lord and return peace to Deltora.

episodes.title: Lief bôken no tabi he
episodes.plot: A young warrior sets out to rid his homeland of its evil conqueror. In the opener, Lief and his guardian, Barda, embark on their quest to locate the seven gems necessary to free Deltora from the Shadow Lord.

episodes.title: Mori no shôjo Jasmine
episodes.plot: Danger surrounds Lief and Barda in the Forests of Silence as they meet a mysterious girl while searching for hidden gems.

episodes.title: Ôgon no kishi goal
episodes.plot: Jasmine leads Lief and Barda to a giant knight in the forest who believes they've come to rob him.

episodes.title: Nazo nazo kyojin no noroi
episodes.plot: Lief heads for the Lake of Tears, but he must first journey though Thaegan's land and solve riddles posed by her guard.

episodes.title: Niji to dozzi no wana
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends are chased by Grey Guards after rescuing a Ralad man.

episodes.title: Nageki no mizuumi ni sumu kaibutsu
episodes.plot: Manus guides Lief to the Lake of Tears by way of his homeland, where they learn a surprising truth.

episodes.title: Majo thaegan arawareru
episodes.plot: Lief tries to take the gem from Soldeen, a giant monster, but is interrupted by Thaegen, an evil sorceress.

episodes.title: Tom no fushigi na mise
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends move toward the next destination after defeating the Thaegan Sorceress, but Lief realizes they're being followed when the belt signals danger and Jasmine gets a bad feeling.

episodes.title: Kurîn chûnai!
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends are stuck in Noradz, whose residents clean obsessively and whose ruler wants Lief and his friends to stay.

episodes.title: Rôgoku kara no dasshutsu
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends must fight their way out of Noradz after escaping from a dungeon in which they'd been imprisoned.

episodes.title: Hanahiro kawa wo watare
episodes.plot: Lief and friends escape from Noradz hidden in a food wagon that takes them to Tom's store, where they learn that the Shadow Lord rules over Noradz.

episodes.title: Ratto citeî no Ô
episodes.plot: The group searches for the third gem in the City of Rats and encounters Reeah, a giant snake that guards the city's towers.

episodes.title: Endon to jâdo
episodes.plot: Lief and friends evacuate from the City of Rats. While resting by the Broad River, Lief shares the story of his father and King Endon with Jasmine.

episodes.title: Ubawareta hôseki
episodes.plot: Lief tells the story of his father, Jarred, King Endon, and Queen Sharn, who've all vowed to one day recover the belt's stolen gems.

episodes.title: Un ga ii? Warui?
episodes.plot: A festival in Rithmere draws the attention of Lief and his friends, who try to win 100 gold coins by participating in its Games.

episodes.title: Risumea kyôgi taikai
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends are in danger of missing the games after they're locked in their rooms at the inn and threatened by a stranger.

episodes.title: Test of Endurance
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends get advice before they compete in the final round of the games.

episodes.title: Jasmine vs Doom
episodes.plot: Jasmine is forced to compete in the last round of the games after discovering that some of her opponents have been poisoned.

episodes.title: The Boy from the Resistance
episodes.plot: The Grey Guards attack Lief and his friends as they journey to the Shifting Sands, but help comes from an unexpected source.

episodes.title: The Shifting Sands
episodes.plot: The Grey Guards continue their pursuit as Lief and the others search for the fourth gem in the Shifting Sands, where they meet Terreocti, the Sand Beast.

episodes.title: The Heavenly Stone
episodes.plot: After a swarm of bees attacks him, Lief loses consciousness and receives advice about his quest from his parents while dreaming.

episodes.title: Thaegan's Return
episodes.plot: The sorceress Thaegan is revived by the Shadow Lord and vows revenge against Lief, who continues his journey. Meanwhile, Jasmine has doubts about Francoise.

episodes.title: Thaegan's Trap
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends find Francoise's mother in the palace, but they end up trapped after Thaegen tricks them.

episodes.title: Meeting Prin
episodes.plot: Lief has a nightmare that reveals a door bearing the Shadow Lord's mark after he and his friends drink from the Dreaming Spring on their way to Dread Mountain.

episodes.title: Kin to the Air
episodes.plot: Lief's resolve is renewed after he dreams about his parents.

episodes.title: Vraal Attack!
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends avoid gnomes and arrive at Dread Mountain, where they encounter the Grey Guards and a powerful monster.

episodes.title: Trapped Under Dread Mountain
episodes.plot: Sports Quest goes to Sweden where teams of athletes take on one of the toughest one day races in the world, the Otillo swimrun. We visit Sipi River Lodge at Mount Elgon in Uganda and follow the Absa Cape Epic mountain bike stage race in South Africa.

episodes.title: The Great Gellick!
episodes.plot: The trapped group learns they're being observed in the cave and devise a plan to trick their captors, escape, and find the fifth gem.

episodes.title: The End of the Carn Squad?
episodes.plot: The group leaves Dread Mountain with the fifth gem but are caught in thick fog as the Grey Guards pursue them.

episodes.title: The Mysterious Ols
episodes.plot: Dain saves Lief's life when the group is attacked on the way to the Maze of the Beast.

episodes.title: Goodbye, Jasmine
episodes.plot: Lief and his friends are detained at the Resistance hideout until they're cleared of being the Shadow Lord's Ols. Meanwhile, Jasmine decides to leave the group and travel on her own.

episodes.title: The River Queen
episodes.plot: Jasmine leaves a secret code for Lief, which he finds when his group enters a town ransacked by Bandits. Meanwhile, their new companion Dain reveals more about himself as they travel to the Tol River.

episodes.title: Pirate Attack
episodes.plot: Jasmine rejoins the group on a river boat swarming with pirates and Ols. After the battle, Lief realizes that some of his friends and his belt are missing.

episodes.title: The Pirates' Feast
episodes.plot: Pirates capture Dain and steal the Belt of Deltora; the group locates a map that leads them through the Maze of the Beast and to the pirates.

episodes.title: Maze of the Beast
episodes.plot: Pirates lock the group in the Maze of the Beast, where a frightening monster lives. But they can't try to escape until they find the sixth gem.

episodes.title: Sorceress Thaegan Is Back!
episodes.plot: Dain disappears while Lief and the others escape the Maze of the Beast with the sixth gem. While traveling through the forest, the group is being watched by an unknown person.

episodes.title: Mirror of Fear
episodes.plot: Lief's friends are captured by Thaegan, and Lief must consider putting his quest on hold in order to save them.

episodes.title: Sorcerer Oacus
episodes.plot: The group loses a member of their party while traveling to the Valley of the Lost. Harassed by the Shadow Lord's minions, they take another route.

episodes.title: The Vow of the Torans
episodes.plot: The group is swept along the River Tor to the City of Tora, where Dain's footsteps lead them through the city walls even though they're being followed by the Grey Guards.

episodes.title: The Valley of the Lost
episodes.plot: In the Valley of the Lost, Lief must play a game to win the seventh gem. While playing, he learns shocking news.

episodes.title: The Last Gem
episodes.plot: The identity of the seventh gem's guardian stuns the group, who enters a tough battle to protect the belt and obtain the gem.

episodes.title: The Seven Gems United
episodes.plot: The group must locate the royal heir after finding the last of the seven gems.

episodes.title: Nevets Goes Wild
episodes.plot: Danger awaits the group as they head for the gathering place where the seven tribes must meet to restore the Belt of Deltora's power.

episodes.title: Battle at Withick Mire
episodes.plot: Lief uses the Dreaming Spring to investigate a traitorous transfer of information from the gathering to the Shadow Lord.

episodes.title: The Oath
episodes.plot: A spy remains undetected among the united seven tribes. Lief is concerned but focuses on the pledging ceremony in the hopes that the royal heir will be found.

episodes.title: The Last Battle of Fire
episodes.plot: Lief and the others plan to sneak into the Palace of Del to rescue Dain, who's been kidnapped. But they're attacked by an enemy believed beaten in the Valley of the Lost.

episodes.title: The Seven Tribes!
episodes.plot: Lief's group encounters others in need in the Palace while rescuing Dain, but helping them could turn their mission into a trap.

episodes.title: Who Is Dain
episodes.plot: As an army of Ols attack, Lief and the others finally find out who's been leaking information about them to the Shadow Lord.

episodes.title: A Desperate Rescue
episodes.plot: Jasmine makes a personal discovery as Lief comes to her rescue at the castle while being pursued by the Grey Guards.

episodes.title: Who's the Next King
episodes.plot: Lief must make a choice that may have severe consequences. A battle erupts after the citizens and the Resistance enter the unrest.

episodes.title: Battle of the Ak-Babas
episodes.plot: The forces of evil try to keep Lief from completing his quest and saving his kingdom.

episodes.title: When the Seven Gems Shine
episodes.plot: Lief must battle the Shadow Lord to finish his quest, only after attaining the last piece of the puzzle.
